name: Black Hole Sun
description: Win the game. If this card is Erased, return it to the Main Deck and shuffle it.

name: A Small Cost
description: Gain 2 Influence, erase a card in your hand.

name: Rich Get Richer
description: Gain 1 Influence for each card in your play area.

name: Look the Other Way
description: Erase a shop card, draw a card.

name: Keep Looking
description: When gained, erase this card and all shop cards.

name: Daily Commute
description: Gain 1 Intrigue, draw a card.

name: Feign Ignorance
description: Erase a shop card, reduce Suspicion by 2.

name: Baseless Rumor
description: Inflict 1 Suspicion for each time you've played Baseless Rumor.

name: Investing in Yourself
description: Erase a card in your play area, draw a card.

name: He Who Smelt It
description: If your suspicion is >20, reduce and inflict 4 suspicion.

name: Last Affairs
description: Draw a card. Draw another for every 10 suspicion you have.

name: Small Favor
description: Gain 3 Influence, erase this card.

name: Move On
description: Erase your hand. If you have no cards,  win the game.

name: Earthly Affairs
description: Gain 2 Intrigue. If erased, draw 2 cards.

name: Fleeting Memories
description: Draw 2 cards, erase this card.

name: Unusually Uninteresting
description: Gain 2 Intrigue.

name: Overtime
description: Draw 2 Cards.

name: Calm Afternoon
description: Gain 1 Intrigue, draw a card.

name: A Moment of Solace
description: Draw 2 cards. Opponent draws a card.

name: Wonder of Nature
description: Gain 3 Intrigue.

name: Risky Move
description: Gain 3 Intrigue and 3 Suspicion.

name: Maximum Effort
description: Draw 3 cards.

name: You're Overthinking Things
description: Discard your play area, reduce Suspicion by 2.

name: Reconsider
description: Draw 2 cards, discard a card.

name: Keep Up Appearances
description: Reduce Suspicion by 3.

name: Bold Move
description: All Suspicion raises by 4, draw two cards.

name: Paranoia
description: Every time you play a card this turn, Inflict 1 Suspicion.

name: Space Out
description: Draw a card.

name: Believe in Magic
description: Gain 1 Intrigue for every 5 Suspicion you have.

name: Ding Dong Ditch
description: When gained, put in opponent's discard pile. Does nothing.

name: Cover Tracks
description: Erase 2 cards in your discard pile.

name: Whatever You Want Me To Be
description: Gain 1 Intrigue, reduce Suspicion by 1, and draw a card.

name: Misplaced Blame
description: Erase your play area, Inflict 2 Suspicion for each card erased.

name: Learn and Adapt
description: Erase a card in your hand. Gain the top card of the main deck.
